title: MULTI TALENTED CHRISTINA KINGSBURY
content: – By Sadhana Vikram – Model, Singer, Artist, Writer, Poet & Thinker “Full Many a flower to born to blush unseen and waste its fragrance in the desert air” Christina Kingsbury is a multi talented teen living in Colombo. She was born at Joseph Frazer Nursing Home in Colombo and when she was just 2…
